name: expressa-swagger
description: Beautifully generated documentation for Expressa using swagger + markdown

directories.test: set -ex; for test in test/tests/*; do $test; done

scripts.postinstall: cd public/doc; ln -fs ../../../swagger-ui/dist/lib . && ln -fs ../../../swagger-ui/dist/lang . && ln -fs ../../../swagger-ui/dist/images . && ln -fs ../../../swagger-ui/dist/css . && ln -s ../../../swagger-ui/dist/fonts . && ln -s ../../../swagger-ui/dist/*.js . && ln -s ../../../swagger-ui/dist/o2c.html .
scripts.test: set -ex; for test in test/tests/*; do $test; done
